dimensions:
H x Diam: 29.9 x 42.2 cm (11 3/4 x 16 5/8 in.)
Diam (foot): 17.5 cm (6 7/8 in.)
title: Jazz
description: Wide-mouthed slightly bulbous circular bowl,  tapering to molded circular foot. Exterior of bowl decorated with composition of sgraffito designs of stylized and geometric architecture, advertising signs, cocktail glasses, musical instruments, and figures. Designs scratched through black slip over white body, with bright turquoise transparent glaze overall. Interior of bowl decorated with continuous band of musical staff and notations. Blue glaze continues on interior.
name: Punch bowl
